name: 曾傳蘆
objective:
本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括五大項：
一 常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，拉譜拉斯轉換，   特殊函數。
二 向量幾何與分析：矩陣行列式及特徵問題。
三 傅立葉級數，積分及轉換。
四 偏微分方程及邊界值問題。
五 複變分析及映射轉換。
schedule:
第一週 Vector Spaces (I)
第二週 Vector Spaces (II)
第三週  Vector Functions of One Variable
Velocity, Acceleration, Curvature, and Torsion
第四週Vector Fields & Streamlines
The Gradient Field and Directional Derivatives
Divergence and Curl
第五週 Line Integrals
第六週 Green's Theorem
第七週 Independence of Path and Potential Theory in the Plane
Surfaces in 3-Space and Surface Integrals
第八週 Applications of Surface Integrals
Preparation for the Integral Theorems of Gauss and Stokes
第九週 Midterm Exam
第十週 The Divergence Theorem of Gauss
The Integral Theorem of Stokes
第十一週 The Fourier Series of a Function
Convergence of Fourier Series
第十二週 The Phase Angle Form of a Fourier Series
Complex Fourier Series and the Frequency Spectrum
第十三週 The Fourier Integral
Complex Fourier Integral
The Fourier Transform
第十四週 Fast Fourier Transform
第十五週 The Wave Equation and Initial and Boundary Conditions
第十六週 Fourier Series Solutions of the Wave Equation
第十七週 The Heat Equation and Initial and Boundary Conditions
Fourier Series Solutions of the Heat Equation
第十八週 Final Exam
